text: WXHR-LP (103.5 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Hillman, Michigan. The station is owned by Hillman Community Radio. It airs a community radio format. The station was assigned the WXHR-LP call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on June 9, 2015. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * XHR-LP XHR-LP Category:Radio stations established in 2016 Category:2016 establishments in Michigan Category:Community radio stations in the United States Category:Alpena County, Michigan Category:Montmorency County, Michigan
title: WXHR-LP
